word: IT WAS IN THE 1860'S--THE DECADE OF TWO BASIC HEALTH-REFORM VISIONS (JUNE 6, 1863, AND DECEMBER 25, 1865)--THAT ELLEN G. WHITE BEGAN TO DISCUSS MATTERS RELATING TO SEX. STATEMENTS IN LATER YEARS PROVIDED SOME ELABORATION. IN REFERRING TO SEXUAL INTERCOURSE IN MARRIAGE SHE EMPLOYED SUCH TERMS AS "PRIVILEGE OF THE MARRIAGE RELATION," "PRIVILEGE OF THE FAMILY RELATION," "SEXUAL PRIVILEGES."
